short_summary: M-4 forklift and ancillary items order
full_summary:
**NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT FOR FORKLIFTS AND ANCILLARY ITEMS**

**Solicitation Number:** 23-58156

**Issued Date:** November 3, 2023

**Closing Date and Time:** November 20, 2023, 14:00 EST

**Procuring Office:**

* **National Research Council Canada (NRC)**
* **Finance and Procurement Services**
* **M-58, 1200 Montreal Road**
* **Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6**
* **Contact: Tania Backes, (613) 410-3834 | Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca**

**Purchasing Overview:**

The National Research Council Canada is seeking proposals for one (1) forklift and ancillary items, including training, to meet the needs of the NRC.

**Project Description:**

The scope of the project involves the procurement of one (1) forklift and ancillary items, including training from a supplier with a valid Supply Agreement # E60HS-21FRKL/A. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering all items by January 4, 2024.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) (formerly Agreement on Internal Trade [AIT])
* **Region of Opportunity:** World
* **Region of Delivery:** Canada (National Capital Region)
* **GSIN:** N3900 - Material Handling Equipment
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Basis of Staffing Agreement:**

The contract will be awarded to the successful bidder who submits the lowest valid bid at the close of the tender process. Suppliers already registered as a supplier with NRC will be pre-qualified and allowed to bid on this project.

**Selection Criteria:**

* **Technical:**
	+ The bidder must have a valid Supply Agreement # E60HS-21FRKL/A.
	+ Materials and equipment must meet or exceed the specifications in the technical bulletins and product literature submitted with the tender package.
* **Commercial:**
	+ The bidder must be prepared to submit a detailed quote with their tender package.
* **Financial:**
	+ Evident that they are capable to perform this project as per specifications.

**Submissions:**

All tenders must be submitted to the NRC Bid Receiving Unit at [NRC.Bid
